/** * An XNI parser configuration exception. This exception class extends * XNIException in order to differentiate between general * parsing errors and configuration errors. * * @author Andy Clark, IBM * * @version $Id: XMLConfigurationException.java,v 1.6 2004/08/15 21:22:15 mrglavas Exp $ */
